Synopsis: Creates a new table percentage bar object with specified attributes.
Description: This function creates a new table percentage bar object with the provided attributes. It allows customization of the appearance of the percentage bar within a table.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
New-TablePercentageBar -ColumnID 1 -ColumnName "Progress" -Type 'round' -TextColor "#ffffff" -BorderColor "#000000" -BorderStyle 'solid' -BarColor "#00ff00" -BackgroundColor "#ffffff" -RoundValue 2
Description:
Creates a new table percentage bar object for the column "Progress" with specified attributes.
